About 27 Winter St

Priced to move. Single family detached home in beautiful East Cambridge. Well cared for 2 bdr 1.5 bath gem with huge potential. Recent renovations include luxury vinyl plank flooring, vinyl Harvey-brand windows and PVC trim. Efficient Gas heating system/Bboards, newer roof with 30 year architectural shingles. Brand new H/water heater, newer washer/dryer, Large kitchen w/newer appliances, lots of countertop space, and custom cabinets. Composite deck, mudroom, private backyard for entertaining or letting pups stretch their paws. Full size dry basement for storage, laundry, hobby, with 1/4 bath. Perfectly located, 2 min walk to the Twin City shopping plaza/Goldstar Mothers Park. 5 minute walk to the new Lechmere green line T Station and Galleria Shopping center, 13 minute walk to Boston Museum of Science and Charles River Park, 14 minute walk to Kendall Square/MIT/Redline T Station, 5 minute drive to Interstate 93 and Rt 1.
